description: JSON Schema for tax_exemption class in Elephant Lexicon

exemption_type.description: The type of exemption applied to the property. Must be one of the predefined exemption types.

exemption_value.description: The value associated with the exemption.

request_identifier.description: Identifier value that should be substituted into the source HTTP request to retrieve this specific data.

source_http_request.description: HTTP request configuration for retrieving this data.

body.description: The body of the request, which may contain JSON or other data formats.

content-type.description: Content-Type header for the request, indicating the media type of the resource.

url.description: The URL endpoint for the request.

tax_rate.description: The tax rate associated with the exemption.

tax_year.description: The tax year for which the data applies.

taxable_value_amount.description: The taxable value amount of the property.

title: tax_exemption
